title: Chair in Applied Molecular Pathology
text:
Location : Central Manchester University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust Salary : £75,249 to £101,451 per annum Hours per week : Full Time 
CHAIR IN APPLIED MOLECULAR PATHOLOGY 
DEPUTY CLINICAL DIRECTOR (PROFESSOR AND HONORARY CONSULTANT) 
You will make leading contributions to: inflammation biomarker discovery/translation within the Manchester Molecular Pathology Innovation Centre (MMPathIC); the development of the next generation of clinical and scientific leaders in biomarker science; and clinical patient care in one of the National Health Service partner hospitals constituting the Manchester Academic Health Sciences Centre 
The Institute of Inflammation and Repair is committed to promoting equality and diversity, including the Athena SWAN charter for promoting women’s careers in STEMM subjects (science, technology, engineering, mathematics and medicine) in higher education. The Institute received a Bronze Award in 2013 for their commitment to the representation of women in the workplace and we particularly welcome applications from women for this post.
